snippet.title: Monster Hero: Adventures Teaser
snippet.description:
Monster Hero is an adventure RPG uncovering companion gameplay with unorthodox puzzles, quirky boss fights, and a heart-felt story between humans and monsters.

Dive deep into a tale where dark forces loom and the bond between a young boy and his flying cat, Noah, becomes the beacon of hope in mending the rift between humans and monsters.

Add to wish list now! 
https://store.steampowered.com/app/2582750/Monster_Hero_Adventures/?utm_source=yt

Discord:
https://discord.gg/eXnf7KktdP
